response.overview: Virtual Reality Achieves Realism. With twenty-four sections of VR documentary footage, it forms a  twelve-minute immersive short song. The land and the coastline, the humans and the natives, the endless flow, the endless life. Thanks to the advancement of technology, we are able to update the visual language again, the scene is the story, reaching the real ecology through virtual  reality. It concerns watching, and also recording;  dedicated to the ancestors, and also to the hometown. A tribute to the Lumière brothers.
response.title: Arrival of a Ship at Shitang

release_dates.note: IDF West Lake International Documentary Festival
